Please re-authenticate.");handleAuth(videoId,maxResults);}else if(error.response&&error.response.status===404){setError("Video not found");}else{setError("Failed to fetch comments. Please try again.");}setLoading(false);}};const handleFetchComments=async event=>{event.preventDefault();// Prevent form submission from reloading the page
